implicit.translation[0].definitions[0].d: suggested or understood without being stated directly
implicit.translation[0].definitions[0].e: His statement is being seen as implicit criticism of the work of research laboratories.
Her words contained an implicit threat.
implicit.translation[0].definitions[1].d: forming a central part of something, but without being openly stated
implicit.translation[0].definitions[1].e: Confidentiality is implicit in your relationship with a counselor.
implicit.translation[0].definitions[2].e: They had implicit faith in his powers.
